• You stand tall through sheer force of will. Raise your momentum reset by +2.
  • When you Hearten by cheering your human nature, and/or making fun of the coward wizards and their magic, a miss becomes a weak hit and a weak hit becomes a strong hit.
  • While you are at 0 health, if you are in the middle of a battle, you cannot Face Death, Lose Momentum, or lose consciousness. When the combat ends, Endure Harm (1).
